skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: three ingredient meal
des: The idea is to give people some super simple recipes that they can copy or add additional ingredients to. This can be used to have an easy recipe or just as an idea generator for meal planning.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
